body_html:
In your case I would recommend do clamping before exp to avoid inf at the first place.

Yes, this is how I ended up solving it, but I still think that it would be good to investigate if this behaviour can be fixed, since it's rather unintuitive, especially in the case of where.
body_text:
In your case I would recommend do clamping before exp to avoid inf at the first place.

Yes, this is how I ended up solving it, but I still think that it would be good to investigate if this behaviour can be fixed, since it's rather unintuitive, especially in the case of where.
body:
> In your case I would recommend do clamping before exp to avoid inf at the first place.

Yes, this is how I ended up solving it, but I still think that it would be good to investigate if this behaviour can be fixed, since it's rather unintuitive, especially in the case of `where`.
